data.message: You're a joke. Pointing the finger at people blaming them for the division in this country. Yet you ask your fans to choose between Trump and you. Well fuck you! In the words of The Rock, you #candyass

replies.message: He already said, "Fuck You!" to you. Sit down and stfu.
Bye Felicia
Find your Safe Place! Someone got their feelings hurt 😭❄️😭❄️😭❄️😭❄️

Luckily eminemememememem's word means nothing to the majority of the people. So his Fuck You is nothing more than him trying to be a big boy. Now eminmemememe can sit down and stfu since no one gives a shit.
Ten thousand reacts in half an hour... yeah, clearly no one cares. He don't like you! hahahaha
Marcus Hathaway 😂😂 Only feelings getting hurt are Eminem's and his followers. Notice I started with, "you're a joke"? Which indicates what he said is hilarious.
10k in 40 minutes out of 1.86 billion users.... Yeah, great job ya fucking stroke. lol
Sacha Herman I give a shit, he is only saying what a lot of folks are thinking!  And as usual, he is right! Keep on going Slim Shady, this granny has your back!
The division is already there while you're sympathizing for supremacy.
So the question is.. Was it Trump singlehandedly who divided us? No one is sympathizing for supremacy.
Trump doesn't even like you Alex! Lmao unless ur white and rich
Really? I thought he was my homie. Damn.
Yes, let's not forget if you don't agree with liberals, most blacks, most Hispanics, or most Muslims, you are a racist Nazi, bigot, misogynist, and have 3 or 4 different phobias.....
F*** all Trump supporters whiny little b******
^lol says the guy that's currently whining like a little bitch.
Alex Garcia nfl players started kneeling last year.... Who was our president then? I don't remember... I'll wait for your answer.
I think it was George Bush the 3rd Sacha Herman...

Sacha Herman if it's nothing more than him trying to be a big boy why do you have so much to say it about it? You seem like a salty bitch lmao

BTW it's a little fucked up to use a baby's fave and then get online and talk shit with it there.....
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3jFJTZkMc40

Fuck, eminem, that's bullshit, everyone has the right to their own political beliefs sex, beliefs etc, telling someone not to be yourself, and if you support this don't listen to my music well fuck you eminem, I'm drawin the line ima trump supporter and fuck any one who wants to call me out fucku
